entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Dawson Creek
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:48 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -27.5°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Dawson Creek Airport 9:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -27.5°C
Pressure: 103.1 kPa
Visibility: 1.6 km
Humidity: 74 %
Dewpoint: -30.7°C
Wind: 0 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 24 by morning. Wind chill minus 36 this evening and minus 29 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Friday 23 December 2022
